description: This table contains service line Grouper Ambulatory Surgery Center (ASC) Covered Services Indicator value returned from the third party interface.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim info record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: SVC_GRP_ASC_COV_IND
columns.description: The service line Ambulatory Surgery Center (ASC) Covered Services Indicator field from the Ambulatory Payment Classification (APC) Grouper output fields.
